name: Stranded Repair
description:
GLOBAL GAME JAM 2020 PAGE - https://globalgamejam.org/2020/games/stranded-repair-3

Scavenge through a hostile alien planet searching for the remnants of your destroyed spaceship. Make sure you stay away from the inhabitants of the planet though, as they don't take kindly to visitors!

Programming: Dominic Schmidt-Toms & Davis Dauksts

Artwork: Davis Dauksts

Music: jjo.e - https://soundcloud.com/jj0e

Special thanks: Christian Tofej

Follow the Development here - https://twitter.com/DavisStudio
